about.title: About Me
about.content:
I am a fifth-year Systems Engineering student at the National Technological University and a Full Stack Developer with experience in real-world projects.

I work on the development of scalable web applications, contributing to both frontend and backend, with a strong focus on code quality, maintainability, and user experience.

I currently use Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, and React / Next.js, integrating APIs, databases, and external services, while complementing development with knowledge in Linux infrastructure and automation.

items.description: I manage Linux servers (RHEL, CentOS, AlmaLinux, and Oracle Linux) in virtualized environments using VMware and vCenter, ensuring system stability, availability, and proper operation. I automate operational and maintenance tasks through Bash and PowerShell scripting, optimizing recurring processes and reducing manual errors. I monitor critical services and analyze logs to proactively detect incidents and prevent disruptions in production environments. I participate in configuration standardization, server integration into centralized logging systems, and configuration tasks across both Linux and Windows environments. Additionally, I manage DNS configurations in Google Cloud, ensuring proper domain resolution and service availability.

I participated in the development of a SaaS product for comprehensive restaurant management, working on frontend and backend applications designed for real production environments. I collaborated on automated reservation features integrated with WhatsApp and phone calls, using conversational AI for reservation handling and processing. I developed business logic for managing tables, zones, reservation statuses, orders, tickets, payments, and users, ensuring system consistency and scalability. I implemented integrations with point-of-sale (POS) systems using Square and managed subscriptions, plans, and add-ons through Stripe. I actively contributed to deployment, maintenance, and management of multiple environments (development, testing, and production).

I developed multiple websites in collaboration with a development team, prioritizing user experience and overall performance. I implemented responsive interfaces optimized for mobile devices, adhering to accessibility standards and best development practices. I applied technical SEO strategies and modular design approaches that improved search engine visibility and facilitated code maintenance. I contributed to frontend architecture definition, component modularization, and external API integration to ensure scalability, reusability, and functional expansion of the projects.

items.title: Heroes App
items.description: Explore DC and Marvel heroes, including their alter egos, first appearances, and publishers, in a visual and interactive platform.

items.title: BugsLess Design
items.description: Startup specializing in landing pages, e-commerce, websites, and custom bots tailored to your business needs.

items.title: Mi Marido Te Lo Hace
items.description: A platform for gated communities connecting users with qualified providers, allowing easy search, contact, and service reviews.

items.title: CRUD - NextJS
items.description: Product management system with a user-friendly interface and full CRUD operations, optimized for usability and accessibility.

items.title: E-commerce
items.description: Easily add, edit, and delete products with a search bar and organized categories for seamless catalog exploration.

items.title: Rick and Morty API
items.description: Discover and filter Rick and Morty characters with an interactive card-based design and efficient pagination.

items.title: Parallel QuickSort
items.description: Parallel QuickSort implementation in C with MPI and Sieve of Eratosthenes, optimizing sorting and analysis of large datasets.

items.title: Weather App
items.description: Check the weather in any city with accurate, real-time data in a modern and user-friendly interface.

items.title: ToDo List
items.description: Organize your daily tasks efficiently with an intuitive app for adding, deleting, and managing your to-dos.
